description:
The most popular TV show in outer space has decided to come visit Pekopon (Earth) and film an episode there.  Keroro is starstruck, but the stars of the show are obnoxious, rude, and everything is utterly staged.  The patience of the humans is rapidly wearing thin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shoutai TV ni Shutsuen Seyo! de Arimasu
ケロロ小隊 テレビに出演せよ! であります
